section.name: Overview
section.p: Checkstyle provides XML Schema Definition (XSD) files for validating configuration files and report outputs. These schemas ensure that your XML documents conform to the expected structure.

section.name: Report Schema
section.p: The report schema validates XML output generated by Checkstyle reports.
This schema can be used to validate the XML files produced by Checkstyle's XML logger.
